greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Constant term in Atkin polynomial A_n(j).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..379

M. Kaneko and D. Zagier, Supersingular j-invariants, hypergeometric series and Atkin's orthogonal polynomials, pp. 97-126 of D. A. Buell and J. T. Teitelbaum, eds., Computational Perspectives on Number Theory, Amer. Math. Soc., 1998
formula: Theorem 4 on page 100 and Proposition 6 on page 117 of the Kaneko-Zagier reference gives an explicit formula and a recurrence for these polynomials. See Maple code.
mathematica: Flatten[{1, Table[FullSimplify[(-1)^n * 2^(4*n + 1) * 3^(3*n) * Gamma[2*n - 1/6] / (Gamma[5/6] * Gamma[2*n])], {n, 1, 20}]}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 07 2018 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 28 2009
